message: Accept this fair offer and let's end the game!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'm willing to compromise.
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think this is the end!
I'm getting desperate, Bob. This is my last offer.
You're getting close to giving in, Alice. Don't be stubborn!
I'm almost out of options, Bob. This is my final stand.
You're really running out of time, Alice. Don't make me take everything!
